title: Create GitHub Actions Test Workflow
description: Create a GitHub Actions workflow that runs tests on pull requests.
instructions:
Create a workflow that:
1. Triggers on pull requests to main branch
2. Sets up Java 21 with Gradle caching
3. Runs a PostgreSQL service container
4. Runs ./gradlew test
5. Uploads test results as artifacts

hints.text: Use 'services' to define the PostgreSQL container. It runs alongside your job.
Use 'if: always()' on the artifact upload to ensure results are uploaded even if tests fail.
